text: <a href="../2-Corinthians-2-1/" title="2 Corinthians 2:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 But I determined this with myself, that I would not come again to you in heaviness.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-2/" title="2 Corinthians 2:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 For if I make you sorry, who is he then that maketh me glad, but the same which is made sorry by me?

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-3/" title="2 Corinthians 2:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And I wrote this same unto you, lest, when I came, I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice; having confidence in you all, that my joy is *the joy* of you all.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-4/" title="2 Corinthians 2:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears; not that ye should be grieved, but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-5/" title="2 Corinthians 2:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 But if any have caused grief, he hath not grieved me, but in part: that I may not overcharge you all.
<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-6/" title="2 Corinthians 2:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Sufficient to such a man *is* this punishment, which *was inflicted* of many.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-7/" title="2 Corinthians 2:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 So that contrariwise ye *ought* rather to forgive *him*, and comfort *him*, lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow.
<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-8/" title="2 Corinthians 2:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm *your* love toward him.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-9/" title="2 Corinthians 2:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 For to this end also did I write, that I might know the proof of you, whether ye be obedient in all things.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-10/" title="2 Corinthians 2:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 To whom ye forgive any thing, I *forgive* also: for if I forgave any thing, to whom I forgave *it*, for your sakes *forgave I it* in the person of Christ;
<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-11/" title="2 Corinthians 2:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 Lest Satan should get an advantage of us: for we are not ignorant of his devices.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-12/" title="2 Corinthians 2:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Furthermore, when I came to Troas to *preach* Christ's gospel, and a door was opened unto me of the Lord,

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-13/" title="2 Corinthians 2:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 I had no rest in my spirit, because I found not Titus my brother: but taking my leave of them, I went from thence into Macedonia.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-14/" title="2 Corinthians 2:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Now thanks *be* unto God, which always causeth us to triumph in Christ, and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-15/" title="2 Corinthians 2:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ, in them that are saved, and in them that perish:

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-16/" title="2 Corinthians 2:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 To the one *we are* the savour of death unto death; and to the other the savour of life unto life. And who *is* sufficient for these things?

<a href="../2-Corinthians-2-17/" title="2 Corinthians 2:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 For we are not as many, which corrupt the word of God: but as of sincerity, but as of God, in the sight of God speak we in Christ.
